system.description:
Starting at 17th level, you nearly reach the highest peak of the mysteries your element offers you. Choose one benefit from the following:

Elemental Security

You have certain immunities, determined by your archetype spell list.

  • Fire Priest. Immunity to fire damage and effects.

  • Ice Priest. Immunity to cold damage and effects.

  • Plant Priest. Immune to poison damage, the poisoned condition, as well as spells and effects from the plant school.

  • Stone Priest. Immune to force damage and effects. 

  • Storm Priest. Immune to lightning and thunder damage, and storm effects. 

  • Water Priest. Immune to acid damage and water effects. You also can also breathe underwater, and you gain a swim speed equal to your base walking speed. If you already have a swim speed, it instead increases by 30 feet.

Elemental Freedom

You have a flying speed equal to your walking speed.
